name: (UNFINISHED) A Few Small Things
description:
--- PROJECT UNFINISHED ---

In the spirit of the Godot Wild Jam, this entry was still submitted, but unfortunately it is far from feature complete. I hope you can see the kind of game we were going for here - an erratic, random, stay-on-top-of-everything game. Two of the four rooms are empty (which is a real shame because Bella made some excellent art, though Ollie could not put it together in time!!), but at the very least, there is a nice title screen, tutorial, and SFX/art for you to enjoy! 

This has not been submitted for rating, please refrain from doing so if the jam does not prevent this.

--- ORIGINAL PLANNED INTRO ---

Cat sit for your friend in a cozy cabin, just out of town. Put your feet up, relax... but there are a few small things you might need to get done for Marnie while you are there. Keep the plants watered, the cat fed, the fire blazing, and more.

--- CREDITS ---

Game concept, design and prop art assets - BellaOA

Game programming, music, (some) SFX, principle Twitch streamer - OllieOA

Other SFX from freesounds.org
